feed.title: Valensas « Technology Services
feed.subtitle: Founded in 2005, Valensas is a Turkey based information technology solution provider, helping customers with focused attention and intelligent know-how. As the company has expanded, we have developed a unique series of innovative products and services that are exclusive to Valensas to meet and exceed our clients needs. We create applications and integrate services that ensure our customers remain on the cutting edge of technology and offer them in conjunction with our digital business services.
